All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
Annotation to mark a method as a console command.
CommandLineArgs
Utility class for validating command line argument counts.
CommandPrompt
The general CommandPrompt class provides a REPL (Read-Eval-Print Loop) framework for registering and executing console commands via reflection.
Commands
Container annotation for repeating Command annotations on a method.
Console
Utility class for standard input, standard output and standard error operations.
Console.Error
Nested class for writing various data types and formatted output to the standard error stream.
ErrorCommand
Annotation to mark a method as an error command in a console-based application.
